channel.title: The ultimate choice: TrisidiaX V3 vs. Deathlypvpz V3
channel.description:
Let's face it. These two sources are the most commonly used sources in modern day RSPS. But the ultimate choice is which one is better. Whether it be features, looks (they look the same imo lol), or just it's overall qualities, judge them on anything!
I'll go first:
TrisidiaX V3 > Deathlypvpz3 On features and the owners' coding styles.
[hr]
Specs of the servers:
[hr]
[u][b]TrisidiaX V3[/b][/u] Pros:
[ul][li]The owner actually knows about polymorphism.[/li] [li]The owner's code is more efficient than Deathlypvpz[/li][/ul]
Cons:
[ul][li]Conventions are bad.[/li] [li]Doesn't give proper credits.[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[b][u]Deathlypvpz V3[/u][/b] Pros:
[ul][li]Has more features than TrisidiaX V3.[/li] [li]Better item managing system.[/li][/ul]
Cons:
[ul][li]Bad, horrid conventions.[/li] [li]Owner is too penisy.[/li][/ul]

item.title: The ultimate choice: TrisidiaX V3 vs. Deathlypvpz V3
item.dc:creator: @Yo_Im_Austin Yo Im Austin
item.description:
@Yo_Im_Austin wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:12, topic:499154”][quote author=thakillah link=topic=617382.msg4244782#msg4244782 date=1362032288]
neither ahram neither
[/quote]
Why do you people create another made up choice, when the OP clearly asks for your final decision on TWO choices. If he really thought both of them were poo, why would he even ask for our input?[/quote]

Yeah You Gotta Good Say Hahaha.

Fucking Retards Just Getting Post Count Up…

Id have to go with TrisidiaX

Read full topic

item.title: The ultimate choice: TrisidiaX V3 vs. Deathlypvpz V3
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

arham 4:

Why don’t you guys get I just posted this for these 2 options. I don’t even use winterLove, I use LightRune and Hyperion…

Both LightRune and Hyperion still use ideas from WinterLove. Also your poll is trash having two options that are hardly even different to each other is a waste of time and a thread. If you cannot take other opinions then don’t post a poll at all, no one here is going to say which is better because neither is better, the best you can do is either a more modern framework that has been build to fix the many issues of older generation bases or create one your self.

Read full topic

item.title: The ultimate choice: TrisidiaX V3 vs. Deathlypvpz V3
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Lets see the options bloated WinterLove base with years of patch code here and their, no documentation making it a developers worst nightmare, to add to which a large lack of anything OO except that they use a language which is OO… We must then add to the fact that the base of which we are talking about uses the protocol most likely incorrectly in areas making it so you must patch clients rendering them useless for anything except the crap to which they connect to. We can then go on to add that the years of updates have done nothing but stall any progress in which the base could have gained but lost due to misleading information and horribly crafting tutorials that did nothing except bloat the code base with a bunch of redundant methods mostly of which named with either a 1, 2, or 3 after it. now that we’re done with talking about both bases added to this poll, lets just forget the poll and go with a more modern base that doesn’t fall in between what has just been mentioned? How about Apollo, or Hyperion, hell even Rune-Source is a far superior alternative to the two servers you posted.

Read full topic
